description:
L1AtomicTokenBridgeCreator._getScaledAmount(address,uint256) (contracts/tokenbridge/ethereum/L1AtomicTokenBridgeCreator.sol#604-618) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- scaledAmount = amount / (10 ** (18 - decimals)) (contracts/tokenbridge/ethereum/L1AtomicTokenBridgeCreator.sol#610)
	- scaledAmount * (10 ** (18 - decimals)) < amount (contracts/tokenbridge/ethereum/L1AtomicTokenBridgeCreator.sol#612)
markdown:
[L1AtomicTokenBridgeCreator._getScaledAmount(address,uint256)](contracts/tokenbridge/ethereum/L1AtomicTokenBridgeCreator.sol#L604-L618) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [scaledAmount = amount / (10 ** (18 - decimals))](contracts/tokenbridge/ethereum/L1AtomicTokenBridgeCreator.sol#L610)
	- [scaledAmount * (10 ** (18 - decimals)) < amount](contracts/tokenbridge/ethereum/L1AtomicTokenBridgeCreator.sol#L612)
